name: AdvancedSmoke
description: Cross platform web smoke tests with header support, proxy support and retry option.
author: Arne Petersen

inputs.name: inputType
inputs.label: Input Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Define a single URL or a list of URLs.

inputs.name: urls
inputs.label: List of URLs
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URLs including the protocol, one per line.

inputs.name: status
inputs.label: Expected HTTP status code
inputs.helpMarkDown: HTTP status code to validate against.

inputs.name: proxy
inputs.label: Proxy
inputs.helpMarkDown: The proxy server used for the request(s). You can also specify ADVANCED_SMOKE_PROXY environment variable. HTTP_PROXY, HTTPS_PROXY and NO_PROXY are also supported.

inputs.name: strictSSL
inputs.label: Strict SSL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether SSL certificates are required to be valid.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of milliseconds to wait for a server to send response.

inputs.name: retryCount
inputs.label: Retries
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of retries in case of failed tests.
